ComicInfo.Penciller: Patrick Blaine,Jim Valentino,Chance Wolf,Jim Valentino,Chance Wolf,Patrick Blaine
ComicInfo.Summary: The Monster Within Part Five: With Supreme In One Adventure -- Together!: Shadowhawk is transported home to New York where he finds himself right in the thick of a battle between Supreme and the Fantastical Four. He begs Supreme for a few drops of blood to cure him of AIDS but Supreme has no time for him and blasts him instead. During the fracas, Shadowhawk's mask comes off and nearby police recognize him as Paul Johnstone. Phoebe teleports him away just as the cops prepare to gun him down.
ComicInfo.Title: The Monster Within Part Five: With Supreme In One Adventure -- Together!
